body.p: An entity shall disclose if, in the current or previous reporting periods, it has reclassified any financial assets in accordance with paragraph 4.4.1 of IFRS 9. For each such event, an entity shall disclose:

li.p: a detailed explanation of the change in business model and a qualitative description of its effect on the entity’s financial statements.
the amount reclassified into and out of each category.
